thread.title: Google thaws (a little) on defamation cases
thread.title_full: Google thaws (a little) on defamation cases

author: Chris Silver Smith
title: Google thaws (a little) on defamation cases
text:
Would-be-legal remedies for online reputation issues are still up in the air, explains contributor Chris Silver Smith, arguing that it may be time to amend the applicable legislation.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
